topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d9b24d6368724690992500#post_54d9b24d6368724690992500
There are instances of it dating back earlier, but according to Wikipedia...

"Two brothers, hunters with taxidermy skills, popularized the American jackalope in Douglas, Wyoming, in the 1930s by grafting deer antlers onto a jackrabbit carcass and selling the combination to a local hotel. Thereafter, they made and sold many similar jackalopes to a retail outlet in South Dakota, and another taxidermist continues to manufacture the horned rabbits in the 21st century."

topics.body: I'm not gonna lie, if I ever found a time machine I would fuck things up sooooo hard. Just for shits and giggles too. I'd go back in time and murder a dinosaur for the sole purpose of seeing what they tasted like. I'd go drinking with Blackbeard and warn him about what happens off the coast of South Carolina. I'd talk to Elvis and tell him to stop doing so many drugs. And I would steal sooooo much stuff, and with that money I would bankroll Nikola Tesla's experiments.
